function_call.name: classify_risks
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"High reliance on social media for communication and decision making may lead to echo chambers and confirmation bias, influencing public perception of covid-19.","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Exclusion of individuals without internet access from the research may lead to a biased representation","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of physical data collection due to lockdown may limit the scope and accuracy of the research findings.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited availability of standardized questions related to covid-19 may affect the consistency and comparability of the survey data.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased social media use due to covid-19 related news and anxiety.","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Relying on social media for healthcare support and information.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Prediction of user behaviors and panic-related searches on google trends.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Spread of fake news creating panic and anxiety","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Social media use leading to anxiety and psychological problems","category":"Mental health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Fast publishing of unfinished or unobserved research during covid-19 leading to circulation of fake news","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Massive transmission of fake news over social media creating chaos and stress","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Misuse of official logos in fake news","category":"Legal risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Rise of racism and xenophobia towards patients and visitors","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Propagation of 5g conspiracy theories on social media","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Misinformation spread on social media about health-related issues","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Low propensity of physicians to use social media for knowledge sharing due to high occupational stress","category":"Mental health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased circulation of misinformation during health crises and pandemics","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased public awareness of wildlife protection through social media","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Two-way dialogue between stakeholders enabled by social media","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased use of social media for politics and decision-making","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Global spread of contagious diseases like covid-19","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Influence of fake news on public awareness and decision-making","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Psychological impact of pandemic on social media users","category":"Mental health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Shifts in energy use due to remote working and home cooking behavior changes during the pandemic","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited dataset size for 2020 only dataset and 2018 vs. 2020 dataset","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unequal distribution of housing units across states in the datasets","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased energy consumption during typical office and school hours due to residential occupancy","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Shift in energy usage pattern due to remote work and school","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Variations in energy use based on income groups and job occupations","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased non-hvac loads in residential buildings","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Fluctuation in energy consumption among different income groups","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential spread of contagious diseases in residential buildings","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased indoor time for higher-income households during the pandemic","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Impact of pandemic on schedules and work requirements for different income groups","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Transition to stay-at-home precautions leading to changes in non-hvac loads","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Impact of pandemic on service industry and lower-income households","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Variations in non-hvac loads due to pandemic affecting different income ranges","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased hvac loads for 2020 compared to 2018 under equivalent weather conditions","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Variation in hvac use due to differences in setpoints adjusted by homeowners","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unexpected patterns in hvac use in august compared to other months","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Variations in weather conditions impacting electricity use patterns","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased total daily load in specific months","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Higher hvac loads dominating summer electricity use patterns","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased energy consumption due to people spending more time at home.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Change in daily routine leading to increased use of kitchen appliances during peak time of energy consumption.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Change in work and school schedules affecting variance and rate of change in non-hvac load profiles.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Large fluctuations in energy usage observed during pandemic-impacted months.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Significant increase in total daily non-hvac loads during pandemic-impacted months.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Differences in data sensitivity and sample size leading to varying percent changes in energy usage.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"}]}
